snippet: The Devils, who lead their playoff series against the Flyers two games to one, are leaning on old hands like two-time Stanley Cup winner Patrik Elias.
abstract: New Jersey Devils, who lead their playoff series against Philadelphia Flyers two games to one, are leaning on veteran center Patrik Elias, who has appeared in 148 playoff games.
lead_paragraph: The Devils, who lead their playoff series against the Flyers two games to one, are leaning on old hands like two-time Stanley Cup winner Patrik Elias.

headline.seo: Patrik Elias Steadies Devils in Tumult of Playoffs
headline.main: Elias Steadies the Devils in Postseason’s Tumult
headline.print_headline: Elias Steadies Devils in the Postseason’s Tumult
